mapper.sql: ANA_DASE_ID, ANA_COL_SNO, ANA_VAR_ID, COL_PNM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.insert:
insert into WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL
ANA_DASE_ID,
ANA_COL_SNO,
ANA_VAR_ID,
COL_PNM,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
WRIT_USER_ID,
WRIT_DTM,
#{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaColSno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL
ANA_VAR_ID = #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_PNM = #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ANA_DASE_ID = #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ANA_COL_SNO = #{anaColSno,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL ( ANA_DASE_ID , ANA_COL_SNO , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID , COL_PNM , COL_LNM , ANA_VAR_ID , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , WRIT_USER_ID , WRIT_DTM ) SELECT B.ANA_DASE_ID , A.COL_SNO AS ANA_COL_SNO , A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , A.COL_PNM , A.COL_LNM , A.ANA_VAR_ID , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.WRIT_USER_ID , A.WRIT_DTM FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP_COL A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.CRE_COMP_ID = A.CRE_COMP_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL WHERE ANA_DASE_ID IN (SELECT ANA_DASE_ID FROM WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL ( ANA_DASE_ID , ANA_COL_SNO , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID , COL_PNM , COL_LNM , ANA_VAR_ID , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , WRIT_USER_ID , WRIT_DTM ) SELECT (SELECT X.ANA_DASE_ID FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV X WHERE X.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS ANA_DASE_ID , B.ANA_COL_SNO , A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CRE_COMP_ID , B.COL_PNM , B.COL_LNM , B.ANA_VAR_ID , B.OBJ_VERS , B.REG_TYP_CD , B.WRIT_USER_ID , B.WRIT_DTM FROM WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL B ON B.ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID WHERE A.ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL ( ANA_DASE_ID , ANA_COL_SNO , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID , COL_PNM , COL_LNM , ANA_VAR_ID , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , WRIT_USER_ID , WRIT_DTM ) SELECT B.ANA_DASE_ID , A.COL_SNO AS ANA_COL_SNO , A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , A.COL_PNM , A.COL_LNM , A.ANA_VAR_ID , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.WRIT_USER_ID , A.WRIT_DTM FROM WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV_COL A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.CRE_COMP_ID = A.CRE_COMP_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL ( ANA_DASE_ID , ANA_COL_SNO , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID , COL_PNM , COL_LNM , ANA_VAR_ID , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , WRIT_USER_ID , WRIT_DTM ) SELECT A.ANA_DASE_ID , B.ANA_COL_SNO , A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , B.COL_PNM , B.COL_LNM , B.ANA_VAR_ID , B.OBJ_VERS , B.REG_TYP_CD , B.WRIT_USER_ID , now() FROM WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE_COL B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
